price: Na Ibilisi [321] ikaba ari na yo nkomoko y’amajini, Twayiremye mu rubeya rw’umuriro rutagira umwotsi, hari imbere y’irema rya Adamu;
arabic: وَٱلۡجَآنَّ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
footnotes: [321] Ibilisi, ni izina ry’ikiremwa ca mbere mu Majini, kiba ari na co cahavuye kiba inkomoko y’amajini. Mu Majini rero, harimwo abemeramana hakabamwo n’abagarariji (amashetani).

meta.transliteration: wal-jāna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāri al-samūmi
